posts.title: Hand Exerciser
posts.content: Keep your fingers strong and nimble by incorporating the hand exerciser into your workouts. Ideal for musicians, it increases and helps maintain strength and dexterity in your fingers in addition to providing a rigorous workout for the hands and forearms.

posts.title: Street Fighter MacBook Sticker
posts.content: Give your laptop some serious <del>street</del> gaming cred when you transform its appearance with the Street Fighter MacBook sticker. This sticker is made with transparent vinyl and displays the powerful Ryu turning the Apple logo into the power source of his next hadouken.

posts.title: Stainless Steel Magnetic Knife Rack
posts.content: Keep your culinary instruments handy so you can slice and dice at a moments notice by hanging them on the stainless steel magnetic knife rack. The blades adhere to the magnetic surface for easy access while giving your kitchen a professional and minimalistic feel.

posts.title: Electric Shock Prank Puzzle Cube
posts.content: Play a fun prank on friends by giving them a tiny jolt using this electric shock prank puzzle cube. Disguised as a Rubik’s cube-like puzzle, it gives the player a small shock when they attempt to solve it by turning the pieces.

posts.title: SoundFloat Luxury Inflatable Lounger
posts.content: Top off your already perfect pool day with an awesome soundtrack by soaking up some rays on the SoundFloat luxury inflatable lounger. The headrest comes fitted with a built-in high-end Bluetooth sound system powered by a removable battery that doubles as a power bank.

posts.title: Giant Multi-Colored Parachute
posts.content: Get the kids excited about playing outdoors again by whipping out this giant multi-colored parachute. This versatile parachute provides loads of fun for all and comes in sizes ranging from 6 feet to 30 feet in diameter.

posts.title: Star Wars Lightsaber Lamp
posts.content: Use the power of the Force to spruce up your room’s interior using this Star Wars lightsaber lamp. The lampshade features detailed images of the series’s iconic characters and features an eye-catching base made up of 3 incredibly detailed LED lightsabers.

posts.title: Thimble Safety Cutter
posts.content: Avoid cutting yourself when opening boxes by slipping this thimble safety cutter on your finger. This ultra-portable tool is crated from silicone rubber and fitted with a small knife at the tip so that you can easily slice through boxes or letters in one fluid motion.

posts.title: Beau Brummell Gentlemen’s Facial Mask
posts.content: Help maintain a youthful and healthy look without having to dig into your girlfriend’s creams by applying Beau Brummell gentlemen’s facial mask. It’s made with natural activated charcoal that detoxifies the skin by absorbing oils and bacteria from deep within pores.

posts.title: Keychain Safe
posts.content: Keep your spare cash protected and always at hand by placing it inside this keychain safe. Crafted from corrosion resistant stainless steel, this compact storage vessel features a water tight seal and is big enough to perfectly fit US currency <del>and drugs</del>.

posts.title: The Runner’s Bell
posts.content: Avoid colliding with pedestrians when you’re jogging around town by bringing along the runner’s bell. This small brass bicycle bell for joggers is worn like a ring and activated with a flick of your fingers so you can kindly warn others to get out of your way.

posts.title: Glitter Clean Up Cloth
posts.content: End glitter’s reputation of being the herpes of the arts and crafts world by handing out these glitter clean up cloths to your students. The specialized sticky surface of the cloth acts as a glitter magnet that sucks up every little insufferable speck of glitter.
